meanings.definition: A flat, unleavened Indian bread made of whole wheat flour.
meanings.sent1: My mom made delicious chappatis for dinner.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy eating chappatis with curry.
meanings.sent3: The chappati tried to dance in the pan as it cooked.
meanings.sent4: The chappati was a warm blanket for the spicy curry.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of freshly baked chappati filled the kitchen.

meanings.definition: To cook or heat up a chappati.
meanings.sent1: I will chappati the bread on the stove.
meanings.sent2: She chappatis the dough until it's golden brown.
meanings.sent3: The chef accidentally chappatied the chappati too long.
meanings.sent4: He chappatis the chappati with precision and care.
meanings.sent5: Chappatiing the bread made the kitchen smell wonderful.
